channel.title: What Happened to the Crowbar?
channel.description: In Half-Life: Source I mean. I'm not a genius with modeling or anything but I would like to get into it one day. But I just can't put my finger on it. It seems like the texture has changed but that wouldn't make any sense because they didn't do that for anything else in the port. It looks good though. But I've always wandered what the technical term is for what they did to it. :smiley:

item.title: What Happened to the Crowbar?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
It’s called a new engine. Same model, same textures, new lighting engine. That’s all.

Read full topic

ill find your missing crowbar, just give me the keys to your house

item.title: What Happened to the Crowbar?

item.description:
Actually, I noticed Barney’s helmet being shinier, but I still don’t really see a difference on the crowbar.

item.title: What Happened to the Crowbar?

item.description:
I think he wondering what they did to the crowbar model between goldsrc and the Source port of Half-Life. Like specularization, or retexturing.

item.title: What Happened to the Crowbar?
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
In Half-Life: Source I mean. I’m not a genius with modeling or anything but I would like to get into it one day. But I just can’t put my finger on it. It seems like the texture has changed but that wouldn’t make any sense because they didn’t do that for anything else in the port. It looks good though. But I’ve always wandered what the technical term is for what they did to it.
